quizzes.question: Which of the following characters indicates comments in PHP?

Fill in the blanks to make the text a comment.
[!raw!]
{0} Name: John
    Age : 24
    Date: 05/06/2014
{1}
quizzes.textContent:
[h1]Multi-Line Comments[/h1] [b]Multi-line[/b] comments are used for composing comments that take more than a single line. A multi-line comment begins with /* and ends with */. [code format="php" codeId="461"]Hello World!

"; [b]/* This is a multi-line comment block that spans over multiple lines */[/b] echo "

I am learning PHP!

"; echo "

This is my first program!

"; ?>[/code] [note]Adding comments as you write your code is a good practice. It helps others understand your thinking and makes it easier for you to recall your thought processes when you refer to your code later on.[/note]
